front.title: ALTO New Transport: Server Push using PUSH_PROMISE of HTTP/2

abstract.t: The ALTO New Transport [draft-ietf-alto-new-transport] introduces ALTO transport information structures (TIS) at an ALTO server. The introduction of ALTO TIS allows at least two types of efficient transport using HTTP: (1) HTTP/2/3 independent client long poll allowed by non-blocking, newer HTTP, and (2) HTTP/2 specific server push. This document defines HTTP/2 specific server-push ALTO transport based on ALTO TIS.
